title: LLVM ERROR: "Vector elements must have same size" with -Zmir-opt-level=3

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-debug-assertions
labels.description: This issue requires debug-assertions in some way

body:
### Code You may need a debug-assertions build of llvm to reproduce this. Interestingly this only triggers with mir-opt-level `3` but not with `2`. ```Rust #[derive(Clone)] pub struct Foo(Bar, u32); #[derive(Clone, Copy)] pub struct Bar(u8, u8, u8); fn main() { let foo: Vec = Vec::new(); let _ = foo.clone(); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc @ 371100b1fb811e604f7451eff3b06960587fe1af with full rustc + llvm debug assertions ``` ### Error output `rustc -Copt-level=3 103380.rs` ``` rustc: /home/matthias/vcs/github/rust_debug_assertions/src/llvm-project/llvm/lib/Transforms/Vectorize/LoopVectorize.cpp:2907: llvm::Value *llvm::InnerLoopVectorizer::createBitOrPointerCast(llvm::Value *, llvm::VectorType *, const llvm::DataLayout &): Assertion `(DL.getTypeSizeInBits(SrcElemTy) == DL.getTypeSizeInBits(DstElemTy)) && "Vector elements must have same size"' failed. ```
Backtrace

``` rustc: /home/matthias/vcs/github/rust_debug_assertions/src/llvm-project/llvm/lib/Transforms/Vectorize/LoopVectorize.cpp:2907: llvm::Value *llvm::InnerLoopVectorizer::createBitOrPointerCast(llvm::Value *, llvm::VectorType *, const llvm::DataLayout &): Assertion `(DL.getTypeSizeInBits(SrcElemTy) == DL.getTypeSizeInBits(DstElemTy)) && "Vector elements must have same size"' failed. ```
